name: Brick Breaker Edition Shoot
description:
Brick Breaker Edition Shoot is a fast paced arcade game, in which you shoot blocks into the empty spaces of the wall.. Try to break all the bricks without dropping the ball into the abyss. There's powerups that randomly spawn after breaking a brick to help you get through the levels.
How to play:
Slide left or right to control your space ship in order to keep the ball in the screen and hit the bricks.
